Headline: #70 Division Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Dearborn/Elm
ShortDescription: Eastbound 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Clark, Oak Street and Dearborn due to street blockage near Dearborn/Elm.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Clark, Oak Street and Dearborn, due to street blockage near Dearborn/Elm.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/King Drive
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove and 75th due to street blockage near 75th/King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove and 75th, due to street blockage near 75th/King Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/47th
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 43rd, Cottage Grove, 51st and King Drive, due to street blockage near King Drive/47th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via King Drive, 43rd, Cottage Grove, 51st and King Drive, due to street blockage near King Drive/47th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at King Drive/47th
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses temp. rerouted WB: 47th, Cottage Grove, 43rd, Michigan and 47th; EB: 47th, Indiana, 43rd, Cottage Grove and 47th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near King Drive/47th, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 47th, Cottage Grove, 43rd, Michigan and 47th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 47th, Indiana, 43rd, Cottage Grove and 47th.

Allow extra travel time.
